title: Use the new XHarness .NET tool and latest .NET 6 MAUI
body:
**Description of Change**

Part of https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/2425, but just the bits to make the dotnet things work. This also updates to the latest .NET 6 SDK and also .NET 6 MAUI SDK. Not essential, but I want to make sure we are on the latest bits to reduce the chance of SDK issues.
